creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: Depicts the fierce-faced Seitaka Doji, one of the childlike attendants of Fudo Myoo. Fudo is often shown with a pair of such attendants, or else with a group of eight. Seitaka is usually paired with the calmer-visaged Kongara. Here, Seitaka stands on a rocky platform, his chin resting on one hand. His robe and jewelry and decorated with kirikane.
medium: ink, color, gold and cut-gold leaf on silk
title: Seitaka D≈çji
